entry.def: Elderberries are the edible black berries that grow on an elder bush or tree.
An elderberry is an elder bush or tree.

means.word_mean: 1. common black-fruited shrub or small tree of Europe and Asia; fruit used for wines and jellies
2. berrylike fruit of an elder used for e.g. wines and jellies
